system.note: Space Marines Only, not easily acquirable. Is combined with a missile rack and auto-loaded mounted to the backpack power unit that can refill the launcher from a back-mounted ammo source.

description.value:
Special: SM Wep

Note: Space Marines Only, not easily acquirable. Is combined with a missile rack and auto-loaded mounted to the backpack power unit that can refill the launcher from a back-mounted ammo source.
